00015 PathCrawler::PathCrawler(const char *_path)
00016 {
00017         path = _path;
00018         rest = path;
00019         sep = '/';
00020 
00021         found = path.find_last_of(sep);
00022 }
00023 
00024 PathCrawler::PathCrawler(const char *_path, const char _sep)
00025 {
00026         path = _path;
00027         rest = path;
00028         sep = _sep;
00029 
00030         found = path.find_last_of(sep);
00031 }

00033 PathCrawler::~PathCrawler()
00034 {
00035         components.clear();
00036 }
00037 
00038 int PathCrawler::has_next()
00039 {
00040         return (found == string::npos && rest.length() == 0) ? 0 : 1;
00041 }
00042 
00043 string PathCrawler::get_next()
00044 {
00045         if(found == string::npos && rest.length() > 0) {
00046                 last = rest;
00047                 rest.clear();
00048                 
00049                 return last;
00050         }
00051         last = rest.substr(found+1);
00052         rest = rest.substr(0, found);
00053 
00054         found = rest.find_last_of(sep);
00055 
00056         return last;
00057 }
00058 
00059 int PathCrawler::break_queries()
00060 {
00061         size_t firstpos, lastpos;
00062         string respath;
00063 
00064         firstpos = path.find("/(");
00065         lastpos = path.find(")/");
00066 
00067         if (firstpos != string::npos && lastpos == string::npos
00068                         && path.at(path.length()-1) == ')') {
00069                 lastpos = path.length()-1;
00070         }
00071 
00072         /* path with no queries */
00073         if (firstpos == string::npos || lastpos == string::npos) {
00074                 return 0;
00075         }
00076         /* if the query it's not the first element in the path, save the  begining
00077          * ( the real path) in the list */
00078         if (firstpos != 0)
00079                 first_path = path.substr(0, firstpos);
00080 
00081         /* path with one or more queries */
00082         respath = path;
00083         while (firstpos != string::npos && lastpos != string::npos) {
00084                 try {
00085                         components.push_back(respath.substr(firstpos+1, lastpos - firstpos));
00086                         if(lastpos == respath.length()-1) {
00087                                 respath = "";
00088                                 break;
00089                         }
00090                         respath = respath.substr(lastpos+1);
00091                         firstpos = respath.find("/(");
00092                         lastpos = respath.find(")/");
00093                         if (firstpos != string::npos && lastpos == string::npos
00094                                         && respath.at(respath.size()-1) == ')') {
00095                                 lastpos = respath.size()-1;
00096                         }
00097                 }
00098                 catch(std::exception) {
00099                         DBG_PRINT("Nasty exception in %s:%d\n", __func__, __LINE__);
00100                         return components.size();
00101                 }
00102         }
00103         /* do we have another component that is not a query? */
00104         rel_path = respath;
00105         
00106         return components.size();
00107 }
00108 
00109 string PathCrawler::pop_next_query()
00110 {
00111         string current;
00112         
00113         current = components.front();
00114         components.pop_front();
00115         
00116         return current;
00117 }
00118 
00119 int PathCrawler::has_next_query()
00120 {
00121         return  (components.size() == 0) ? 0 : 1;
00122 }
